mapper.select: select i.* ,r.apply_num, r.accept, c.category_name from influencer i inner JOIN receive_campaign r ON r.influencer_num = i.influencer_num JOIN category c ON i.category_id = c.category_id where r.campaign_num = #{campaignNum}
mapper.update: update receive_campaign set accept = 1 where apply_num=#{applyNum}
mapper.select: select apply_num from receive_campaign where campaign_num =#{campaignNum} and influencer_num =#{influencerNum}
mapper.delete: delete from receive_campaign where campaign_num =#{campaignNum} and influencer_num =#{influencerNum}
